details:
Kopete is an instant messaging and chat application with support for a wide
 variety of services, such as AIM, Yahoo, ICQ, MSN, and Jabber.  Advanced
 features and additional protocols are available as plugins.

 This package is part of the KDE networking module.
 protocol::gadu-gadu, protocol::irc, protocol::jabber,
 protocol::msn-messenger, protocol::oscar, protocol::yahoo-messenger,
 role::program, scope::application, suite::kde, uitoolkit::qt,
 use::chatting, works-with::im, x11::application
